text:
Hello, my name is Alex Dupont, I am twenty-one years old.
Today, I will give you my opinion about the AirPods Max. The AirPods Max is a bluetooth headphone and it made by the company Apple.
Apple is an american company maked by Alex Dupont, this company is specializing in smartphone, computer and many other technological products.
Now, let's talk about the AirPods Max, this headphone came in the market during the year twenty twenty. The price of this item is six hundred and thirty euros. Before the conception of this headphone, Apple created earphones and now, they come in the market of the headphone. The AirPods Max is bluetooth, so the advantage is you can move with him without problem. This headphone is available with different colors like black, white, pink, green and blue.
How can we explain the price of this headphone? First of all, we pay the mark, because everybody knows that Apple's items are very expensive and this headphone don't break this rule. But this headphone have many advantages. This headphone is built with metal, so it's very resistant. After, you have a reduce of sound who is absolutely perfect. More of that, you have a transparence mode, who is the opposite of the reduce of sound, you can hear everything around you. Then, after the new update, you have the spatial audio who give a new experience for hear music.
To conclude, I will give my opinion about this AirPods Max, I find this item very expensive, but I find it very esthetic and very confortable, the sound is very good and the reduce of sound and transparence mode are perfects.
